post.body: Still no invite, but am going to use Tumblr. Needed a replacement for private offline chat. Was using Pownce but that's dead now.
I wish someone would rap over Autechre. I suppose I could make my own mashup.
Thanks to Michelle, I had a wonderful and perfect Turkey Day. Just the right mix of food, drinks, and friends. I think it's my best ever.
"When I left you this morning my mental image was of you sleeping next to your iPhone, like a stuffed animal or something."
Apparently I just saw Rami from Project Runway here at the airport.
Sea lions at wharf were cool. Chinatown was okay. I loved Japantown! Was surprisingly moved. On my way home now. Will miss the warm weather.
Sigh. Wish I had thought to look for goth clubs sooner. How embarrassing. Feel like a failure. That's what I get for straying from my roots.
Walked around downtown San Francisco after midnight, but it was boring and just made me miss Tokyo. People I saw were annoying or scary.
Went to the Castro with Tim and Michelle. I prefer Shinjuku Ni-chome.
I am at a hookah bar with Nicole. In fifteen minutes we saw two fights. Only a couple of blocks from the hotel the conference is in.
Staying at a hostel. Very hot last night. Otherwise great. Very cheap. Discovered I forgot underwear this morning. Woke at 8. Am tired now.
With dilligence my paper and presentation turned out well. Was good to have some genuinely positive responses. Am more awake than should be.
I am in San Francisco now. Also, had to turn off my phone before I got a chance to mention American Airlines charges $15 for your first bag.
Sitting on the plane waiting to take off. Flight is about five hours long.
It's 3 a.m. and my trip to San Francisco for the big anthroplogy conference has begun. Currently on the shuttle to Chicago.
"It makes a statement that LGBTI people are interested in matters of politics and governance and not just sex." http://tinyurl.com/6rgbxf
You know you're a graduate student when... your eyes almost fall out of their sockets when you first see a PDF magically load on an iPhone.
iPhone magic: "Oh shit! You're going to be so excited. It's made me enjoy life more. Is that sad? Fuck it. It provides pleasure right?"
Does this mean I can call myself a photographer? http://tinyurl.com/5e6ghh
"Ubuntu? I'm going to learn Ubuntu?" *http://tinyurl.com/5e7pam
Jeremiah says, "Dude, I had a dream about those "they're all meat" guys." *http://tinyurl.com/yy6bgd
Wow. I just biked in 17 degree weather and survived. Actually it wasn't bad at all. I credit my intimidating face mask. Only shows my eyes.
Not sure what to think of eXistenZ. Liked the idea of a war between realists and virtual realists. Also liked the erotic living game pods.
"No, no, no! You don't have to shoot me! Hey, tell me the truth. Are we still in the game?"
Why must it take so long to export video? Wait, why am I complaining -- I count that when I calculate how many hours I've worked.
Hmmm maybe the virtual doesn't just add a layer to space but to everything, like some sort of cybersense that reveals a hidden dimension.
Those poor Fudge Stripes. They never knew what hit them.
Bettie Page, RIP.
I think "cesspool of flying dildos" is the best description of Second Life I've seen yet. http://tinyurl.com/7uasg5
Yay! Michelle got me some YakTrax! Best gift ever! Maybe I won't fall on the ice this winter! It's a game I play. http://www.yaktrax.com/
Anybody got a Jaiku invite for me?
"Watching romantic comedies can spoil your love life, a study by a university in Edinburgh has claimed." http://tinyurl.com/6loua4
"People just don’t give equality away, you have to take it.” http://www.nytimes.com/2008/12/18/nyregion/18newschool.html
All this reading I've been doing for my race and the Internet paper has gotten me nostalgic for IRC. It will always be special to me.
I must say, this underground bike parking system in Japan is quite rad. http://tinyurl.com/5wogyh
WARNING: Alert to da jailbreakerz. http://tinyurl.com/56x6mo
Don't ever let me forget how terrible this world is. Can't let the opiates cloud my vision. Thank GOD for dark jungle and breakcore.
